metadata.title: CVE-2018-18607 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in elf_link_input_bfd in elflink.c in the BinaryFile Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils2.31. There is a NULL pointer dereference in elf_link_input_bfd when usedfor finding STT_TLS symbols without any TLS section. A specially craftedELF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service, as demonstratedby ld.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
